name: SaveSanta
description:
Save Santa is my first project.

It's a game to put you in the mood for Christmas, nothing too complicated you can just relax while playing with some hot tea. The game is inspired by "Santa Claus in trouble", a game my wife played a lot in her childhood so I thought it would be a good idea to build a game like that as a first project.

Hope you guys enjoy this and I also helped you to get that Christmasy mood.
